name: d3-donut-chart
description: Plugin to create a donut chart with input data set

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-donut-chart.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-donut-chart.js -c -m -o build/d3-donut-chart.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-donut-chart.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-donut-chart.js build/d3-donut-chart.min.js
